org.fishwife.jrugged.spring

Class PerformanceMonitorBeanFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fishwife.jrugged.PerformanceMonitorFactory
      • org.fishwife.jrugged.spring.PerformanceMonitorBeanFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class PerformanceMonitorBeanFactory
extends PerformanceMonitorFactory
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Factory to create new PerformanceMonitorBean instances and keep track of the created instances. If the MBeanExportOperations is set, then the PerformanceMonitorBean will be automatically exported as a JMX MBean.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PerformanceMonitorBeanFactory()
      Constructor.

      void setMBeanExporter(org.springframework.jmx.export.MBeanExporter mBeanExporter)
      Deprecated. 
      void setMBeanExportOperations(org.springframework.jmx.export.MBeanExportOperations mBeanExportOperations)
      Set the MBeanExportOperations to use to export PerformanceMonitorBean instances as JMX MBeans.
      void setPackageScanBase(String packageScanBase)
      If specified, PerformanceMonitorBeanFactory will scan all classes under packageScanBase for methods with the PerformanceMonitor annotation and initialize performance monitors for them.

      • setPackageScanBase

        public void setPackageScanBase(String packageScanBase)
        If specified, PerformanceMonitorBeanFactory will scan all classes under packageScanBase for methods with the PerformanceMonitor annotation and initialize performance monitors for them.
        Parameters:
        packageScanBase - Where should the scan for annotations begin

      • createInitialPerformanceMonitors

        Set the MBeanExportOperations to use to export PerformanceMonitorBean instances as JMX MBeans.
        Parameters:
        mBeanExportOperations - the MBeanExportOperations to set.

      • createPerformanceMonitor

        public PerformanceMonitor createPerformanceMonitor(String name)
        Create a new PerformanceMonitorBean and map it to the provided name. If the MBeanExportOperations is set, then the PerformanceMonitorBean will be exported as a JMX MBean. If the PerformanceMonitor already exists, then the existing instance is returned.
        Overrides:
        createPerformanceMonitor in class PerformanceMonitorFactory
        Parameters:
        name - the value for the PerformanceMonitorBean
        Returns:
        the created PerformanceMonitorBean
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the MBean value is invalid.

      • findPerformanceMonitorBean

        public PerformanceMonitorBean findPerformanceMonitorBean(String name)
        Find an existing PerformanceMonitorBean
        Parameters:
        name - the value for the PerformanceMonitorBean
        Returns:
        the found PerformanceMonitorBean, or null if it is not found.
